_sText:
https://www.patreon.com/masog

surf_hourglass - a tier 1 map meant for both first timers as well as veteran surfers with a well thought out fast route. The map alternates the player between two timelines, and it includes a lot of rarely seen features in Source Engine maps, like moving clouds, dynamically changing skybox, color correction and expensive water on more than one Z axis at once. The map was made for a KSF mapping contest, where it has not won any prizes, but got an honorable mention. As a note from me, I started working on the map around 3 weeks before the contest's deadline, so I unfortunately did not have the time to polish the map and it feels unfinished to me, but I had no other choice than to release it - I hope you enjoy playing it anyway :)

FOR SERVER OWNERS:
- designed for 66/64 tickrate, 150 sv_airaccelerate, 5000 sv_maxvelocity
- in order for all of the map features to work properly, do NOT remove any entities using plugins like stripper etc. on your server

FOR PLAYERS:
- client-side, make sure HDR and color correction are enabled and mat_specular is 1
- if the map appears too dark in some parts, I recommend raising the brightness settings, and if that doesn't help, in worst case you can also disable HDR which will make the map way brighter (but also uglier)
